movies.title: SPA24 Elegy
movies.synopsis:
Based on the novel THE DYING ANIMAL by Philip Roth, this tender film from Isabel Coixet follows David Kepesh, a distinguished professor played by Ben Kingsley, who becomes romantically involved with one of his students, Consuela Castillo, portrayed by Penélope Cruz. Their relationship explores themes of love, desire, aging, and mortality. 

Set against the backdrop of academia and intellectual discourse, the film delves into the complexities of human relationships and the consequences of pursuing passion despite societal taboos. David finds himself grappling with his own insecurities and fears as he becomes increasingly attached to Consuela, whose youthful vitality contrasts with his own aging body and existential uncertainties. 

The film's intimate portrayal of the characters and their emotional struggles is heightened by the stellar performances of Kingsley and Cruz, who bring depth and nuance to their roles. Coixet imbues the work with a poignant exploration of love's transformative power and the profound impact it can have on individuals, even in the face of life's inevitable transience.
movies.shortSynopsis: Based on the novel The Dying Animal by Philip Roth, this tender film exploring love, desire and aging stars Ben Kingsley and Penélope Cruz and follows a distinguished professor who becomes romantically involved with one of his students.

movies.title: SPA24 Chinas
movies.synopsis:
A coming-of-age drama about the fragile time of adolescence, CHINAS tells the story of three young girls growing up in Madrid and their search for identity and belonging. 

Nine-year-old Yun calls herself Lucía and oscillates between a strict, traditional homelife and her assimilated Spanish life at school, while her teenage sister Claudia rebels in search of her place in the world. Lucia feels Spanish and she wants to fit in, but her parents don't speak Spanish and they work all day long in their shop. 

Conflicts and contradictions arise when another girl, Xiang, arrives at Lucía’s school. Both second-generation Chinese girls cross paths, separate and become vital to each other in the search for their identity amidst the dichotomy of cultures. 

Filmed on location in Madrid, this superb third feature from award-winning writer-director Arantxa Echevarria (CARMEN & LOLA) is a fascinating tale that explores childhood, integration and belonging.
movies.shortSynopsis: A superb third feature from writer-director Arantxa Echevarria (Carmen & Lola), this delicate drama about two sisters is a fascinating tale that explores childhood, belonging, integration and the search for identity.

movies.title: SPA24 The Movie Teller
movies.synopsis:
A moving tribute to cinema and the magical power of storytelling, the star-studded new film from multi award-winning director Lone Scherfig (AN EDUCATION, ONE DAY) follows a young woman’s coming-of-age in the rugged heart of Chile’s Atacama Desert in 1966.  

Medardo (Antonio de La Torre, MARSHLAND) and María (Academy Award-nominee Bérénice Bejo, THE ARTIST) lead a simple life with their children, finding joy in the weekly visits to the cinema. However when their routine is disrupted and Medardo can’t go, he asks his daughter to describe it and what begins as a duty soon becomes a gift, as her talent for recounting the films blossoms. With each retelling, she breathes life into the magic of film, attracting and captivating the townsfolk with tales of drama, humour, and romance. As her storytelling prowess grows, so does the town's love for the cinema.  

An adaptation of the award-winning autobiographical novel by Hernán Rivera Letelier, Scherfig’s beguiling film celebrates imagination and the need to find love, community, and hope.
movies.shortSynopsis: A star-studded and moving tribute to cinema and the magical power of storytelling, this new film from multi award-winning director Lone Scherfig follows a young woman’s coming-of-age in a Chilean mining town.

movies.title: SPA24 Salvador Dali: In Search of Immortality
movies.englishTitle: Salvador Dalí: In Search of Immortality
movies.synopsis:
Exploring the life and legacy of the iconic surrealist artist Salvador Dalí. David Pujol’s documentary profile delves into Dalí's extraordinary artistic journey, from his early days in Catalonia to his rise as one of the most influential figures in 20th-century art. 

Produced by the Gala-Salvador Dalí Foundation, this documentary offers a comprehensive look at Dalí's creative process, his eccentric personality, and the profound impact of his work on the art world, through archival footage, interviews, and insights from experts. It explores his collaborations with other artists, filmmakers, and intellectuals, as well as his complex relationship with his muse and wife, Gala. 

Delving into Dalí's exploration of surrealism, his fascination with the subconscious mind, and his ground-breaking techniques, including his famous melting clocks, it also examines the controversies surrounding his art, his flamboyant public persona, and his enduring quest for immortality through his work. This documentary provides viewers with a captivating glimpse into the mind of a visionary artist who continues to captivate audiences.
movies.shortSynopsis: Using archival footage, images and documents this intimate and revelatory documentary examines Salvador Dalí, bringing us closer to a one-of-a-kind genius who managed to live a life that is a work of art unto itself.

movies.title: SPA24 Mamacruz
movies.synopsis:
In comedic, transformative drama Mamacruz, Kiti Mánver (WOMEN ON THE VERGE OF A NERVOUS BREAKDOWN) delivers a standout performance as a religious grandmother who faces a moral dilemma when using the internet.  

Seamstress Cruz (Mánver) has spent years, actually decades, without achieving sexual fulfillment. Religiously devout, it was not something that she considered particularly important, or that she gave much thought to. 

One day, while surfing the internet on her granddaughter’s tablet, she accidentally stumbles across some arousing images, and starts to feel those desires and sensations she had believed were long gone. Now she is faced with a dilemma: how can she balance her religious beliefs with this new awakening? So, Cruz widens her interests, rediscovering the transformative power of her own sensuality and finding enjoyment in forgotten pleasures. 

A dynamic character study that combines humour and eroticism, MAMACRUZ is the second feature from Patricia Ortega that pays tribute to women who decide to choose their own destiny.
movies.shortSynopsis: Kiti Mánver delivers a compelling central performance in comedic yet sensual drama Mamacruz as a religiously devout woman in late middle age who suddenly rediscovers the transformative power of her own sensuality.

movies.title: SPA24 A House on Fire
movies.synopsis:
Have you ever wondered what hides behind the facade of seemingly perfect families?  

This engaging dramedy from festival favourite comedy director Dani de la Orden (THE TEST, YOU KEEP THE KIDS!, THE WEDDING UNPLANNER) explores the darker side of families. 

Montse is thrilled about the upcoming weekend with her family at her house in Cadaqués on the Costa Brava. Although her ex has a new partner, and her children are all grown up with lives of their own, nothing and no one will put a damper on her excitement. She has been dreaming of a family reunion for ages and is determined that the weekend will be perfect - even if she must burn everything to the ground to make it so. 

Focussed on the family ties that unite and divide, A House on Fire features an all-star ensemble including Enric Auquer (TWO MANY CHEFS SPA23), Alberto San Juan (FOUR'S A CROWD SPA23) and Macarena García (THE MINISTRY OF TIME).
movies.shortSynopsis: In this entertaining dramatic comedy from director Dani de la Orden featuring an all-star cast, the facade of a seemingly perfect family is shattered over a weekend in the Costa Brava.

movies.title: SPA24 A Moroccan Affair
movies.synopsis:
A box office hit in Spain and the third installment in the highly successful SPANISH AFFAIR movie franchise (SPANISH AFFAIR SPA15, SPANISH AFFAIR 2 SPA16), A MOROCCAN AFFAIR is an entertaining culture shock comedy. 

Carmen (Elena Irureta, Patria) is determined to carry out the last wish of José María, her husband and the patriarch of the Díaz-Aguirre family - to recover “Sardinete”, the first fishing boat of his fleet, which is anchored in a Moroccan port.  

On her journey from lush Cantabria to exotic Morocco, Carmen is accompanied by her daughter, Begoña (Michelle Jenner, JULIETA), and Begoña’s ex-boyfriend, Guillermo (Julián López), who is desperate to win her back. 

In Morocco, they struggle to overcome cultural barriers and their lives are upended when they uncover a great scandal concealed by the upstanding family patriarch.  

Directed by Alvaro Fernández Armero (IF I WERE RICH SPA21) this comedy tells a tale of overcoming cultural prejudice with humour, tenderness and a touch of romance.
movies.shortSynopsis: A box office hit in Spain and the third installment in the highly successful Spanish Affair movie franchise, the Díaz-Aguirre family’s lives are flipped upside down with a trip to Morocco in this culture shock comedy.

movies.title: SPA24 Aire: Just Breathe
movies.synopsis:
It is the year 2147 and, in a world devastated by chemical warfare, men are sterile due to a virus leaving humankind almost extinct.  

Tania (Sophie Gaëlle Gómez, THE HOUSE OF FLOWERS), a lonely conservation biologist, is trying to inseminate herself to prevent the extinction of humanity with the help of an AI system called VIDA (voiced by Paz Vega, THE HOUSE OF SNAILS SPA23). Communication networks have been destroyed and Tania does her work in an underground bunker, as the air on the surface is highly polluted.  

Things take a turn when Azarias (Jalsen Santana), one of the last men alive and an enigmatic traveller with a dark past, suddenly appears. He disturbs her safe existence alone with VIDA and soon the tension between the three builds to be as toxic as the world they live in. 

The striking fifth film from Dominican writer/director Leticia Tonos Paniagua, her first foray into science fiction, ponders the nature of loneliness, trust and human existence.
movies.shortSynopsis: In the year 2147, a conservation biologist battles the extinction of humanity with the help of an A.I. system but is disturbed when a mysterious traveller arrives in this striking science fiction feature from the Dominican Republic.

movies.title: SPA24 Idol Affair
movies.synopsis:
How would you react if your partner confessed to a romantic entanglement with your idol?  

César (Hugo Silva, The Ministry of Time) and Teresa (Alexandra Jiménez, also in CHECKMATES) are a happy couple until she has an affair with pop singer Coque Malla (played by the real-life star), César’s idol ever since he was a teenager.  

Faced with this unexpected scenario, César decides he needs to speak to Coque, so the couple travels to Miami in search of the legend. Along the way, they reconsider their own lives and their relationship of over 17 years, as they navigate a range of situations from the everyday to the absurd that promise laughter and serendipitous twists of fate. 

Taking inspiration from timeless rom-coms like ANNIE HALL and WHEN HARRY MET SALLY, this captivating feature length debut from directing duo Teresa Bellón and César F. Calvillo is a fun and delightful exploration of love.
movies.shortSynopsis: A charming exploration of love, this romantic comedy starring Alexandra Jiménez and Hugo Silva follows a couple who must deal with an unexpected scenario involving the other’s idol.

movies.title: SPA24 Free Falling
movies.synopsis:
Spanish star Belén Rueda (THE SEA INSIDE) delivers a compelling performance as a gymnastics coach in this intense and complex drama.  

Marisol (Rueda) is the national rhythmic gymnastics’ coach. She is methodical, controlling, demanding, authoritarian, and does not contemplate failure as an option. The World Championship is approaching, and she is pinning all her hopes on Angelica, the most promising newcomer on the team. 

Two weeks before the final, Marisol discovers that her husband is having an affair with a much younger woman. Unable to contemplate failure, Marisol launches into a desperate race to win him back, with no regard for his motives or feelings. Her pain transfers to the mat, where she becomes even more relentless with Angelica, in whom she places her hopes for success. At this point, winning the gold seems to be all she has left.  

Directed by Laura Jou (LIFE WITHOUT SARA AMAT), FREE FALLING is a tale about the limits of power and sacrifice.
movies.shortSynopsis: A suspenseful, emotionally tense, and complex drama starring Belén Rueda as a controlling and demanding national rhythmic gymnastics’ coach who does not contemplate failure as an option.

movies.title: SPA24 Memories of a Burning Body
movies.originalTitle: Memorias de un cuerpo que arde
movies.synopsis:
Raised in a repressive era where sexuality was taboo, sixty-somethings Ana, Patricia, and Mayela found their understanding of womanhood based on unspoken rules and implicit impositions. Now, their fearless voices are channelled into a single 65-year-old woman (Sol Carballo) in the present day. A collective outcry against taboos, their stories poetically combine to form a kaleidoscope of memories, secrets and hidden desires. 

Weaving together the past and the present, this drama is centered on the experience of women and how they understand their sexuality at the different stages of their lives. From sexuality to love, and delving into education, repression, pleasure, motherhood and liberation, it tells the story of a quest to understand themselves as women in a world that limited them.  

Described as the “conversation she never had with her grandmothers”, writer/director Antonella Sudasassi Furniss’ second feature film, MEMORIES OF A BURNING BODY, is a heartfelt exploration of female sexuality and an ode to women everywhere.
movies.shortSynopsis: In this heartfelt drama exploring pleasure and desire through the memory and intimacy of three women over 65, raised in a repressive era, their voices are channelled into a single woman who revisits intertwined memories, secrets and desires.

movies.title: SPA24 Those Who Love
movies.synopsis:
A subversive period drama based on a story by Marie Henry Beyle, otherwise known as 'Stendhal', Isabel Coixet crafts a captivating drama that delves into the complexities of love, guilt, and redemption. Set in Paris, the film centres around Valeria (a compelling Monica Bellucci), a passionate teacher who becomes entangled in a tumultuous affair with Daniel (Eduardo Noriega), a troubled young doctor hiding a dark secret. 

As their relationship unfolds, Valeria is drawn deeper into Daniel's world, confronting her own desires and insecurities along the way. Their romance is fraught with tension and uncertainty, as Daniel's past threatens to unravel their connection and jeopardize the lives of those around them. 

Through its evocative storytelling and nuanced characterisations, Coixet offers a thought-provoking exploration of human relationships and the complexities of the human heart. It is a poignant reminder of the power of love to both heal and destroy, leaving a lasting impression on viewers long after the credits roll.
movies.shortSynopsis: Featuring a luminous leading performance from Monica Bellucci, as a passionate teacher entangled in a tumultuous affair with a troubled young doctor hiding a dark secret, this subversive period piece explores love, guilt, and redemption amidst the complexities of human relationships.

movies.title: SPA24 A Ravaging Wind
movies.synopsis:
A thoughtful coming-of-age drama that explores a young woman's path to change her fate, A RAVAGING WIND is an Argentinian gem from acclaimed writer/director Paula Hernandez (THE SLEEPWALKERS).  

Trapped in a pre-determined destiny and gripped by the blind faith of her father, teenager Leni (Almudena González) joins her father Reverend Pearson (Alfredo Castro), on his cross-country Evangelical mission. 

Having car trouble, they must stop at Gringo’s repair shop, run by a man dramatically opposed to faith (Sergi López), who lives with Tapioca, his teenage son. A storm develops and Reverend Pearson becomes obsessed with saving Tapioca’s soul. While the situation unfolds, Leni sees echoes of her own story and tries to change her seemingly inevitable fate. So, she confronts her father for the first time, in the hope that her life will start at that moment. 

In this quietly powerful drama based on the novel by Selva Almada, tension simmers as complex father-child relationships are explored in the Argentinian countryside.
movies.shortSynopsis: A quietly powerful coming-of-age drama that explores a young woman's path to change her fate, A RAVAGING WIND is a gem from acclaimed Argentinian writer/director Paula Hernandez.

movies.title: SPA24 Spellbound
movies.synopsis:
A classic Hitchcock mystery, SPELLBOUND features stunning performances from Ingrid Bergman and Gregory Peck plus a captivating dream sequence by Surrealist icon Salvador Dalí. 

A psychological thriller delivered in a manner that Sir Alfred Hitchcock is renowned for, the film follows Dr. Constance Petersen (Bergman), a psychoanalyst at Green Manors mental asylum, who becomes entangled in a mystery when the new director, Dr. Anthony Edwardes (Peck), arrives. However, she soon discovers that Edwardes is an impostor suffering from amnesia, and they begin to unravel a web of deceit and psychological trauma. 
 
Arguably the film's most memorable scene is a surreal dream sequence designed by Salvador Dalí, depicting the protagonist's subconscious fears and desires. This dream sequence has become iconic for its visually striking imagery and its exploration of Freudian themes. The overall result is a gripping thriller that delves into the complexities of the human mind, blending elements of romance, mystery, and psychological intrigue to create a suspenseful and thought-provoking cinematic experience.
movies.shortSynopsis: A Hitchcockian psychological thriller following a psychiatrist (Ingrid Bergman) who helps an amnesiac (Gregory Peck) uncover his true identity, leading to a tale of murder, mistaken identity, and psychoanalysis. With a surreal dream sequence by Salvador Dalí, the film explores the depths of the human mind and memory.

movies.title: SPA24 The Teacher Who Promised the Sea
movies.englishTitle: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea
movies.originalTitle: El Maestro que Prometió el Mar
movies.heroImage: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea_1680.jpg
movies.synopsis:
In 1935, Antoni Benaiges (a stellar Enric Auquer, TWO MANY CHEFS SPA23) is hired as a teacher in a small, isolated village in Burgos, Spain. There, he establishes an intense relationship with his students, a group of young boys and girls between the ages of six and twelve. To them, he makes a promise: he will take them to see the sea for the first time in their lives. 

75 years later, the granddaughter of one of those students (played by Laia Costa, also in Un Amor) who has set out in search of her grandfather comes across the wonderful, yet tragic story of his teacher and the tale hidden behind a promise that was never fulfilled.  

Based on the incredible true story of Antoni Benaiges, a Catalan teacher who brought progressive teaching methods from France to the rural village, this emotional drama traversing the past and present, shines a light on the power of education and historical memory.
movies.shortSynopsis: Starring Enric Auquer and Laia Costa, this acclaimed drama tells the true story of Antoni Benaiges, a teacher who brought progressive teaching methods to a small village in 1930s Burgos.

movies.title: SPA24 Something is About to Happen
movies.synopsis:
A thriller with surreal black comedic touches, this unique road movie and journey across Madrid starring Malena Alterio (IN THERAPY SPA23) in a Goya-winning, career-defining performance as a woman looking for freedom. 

Lucia (Alterio) lives an uneventful life as an IT specialist in Madrid. When the company she works for goes bankrupt due to embezzlement, she decides to make a radical change in her life.  

She meets a series of colourful people, including theatre producer Roberta, and flirty journalist Ricardo. Yet, Lucía secretly hopes that one day she will meet actor Braulio, to whom she owes her obsession with the Turandot aria “Nessun Dorma”, and he will become her prince charming. But fantasy doesn’t always live up to reality. 

Adapted from Juan José Millás’ bestselling novel, this dramatic thriller from Antonio Méndez Esparza delivers a refreshing take on the cultural elite, obsession and truth.
movies.shortSynopsis: In this blackly comic dramatic thriller starring Malena Alterio in her Goya-winning role, a woman's life takes a definitive turn the day that she loses her job as a computer programmer and decides to take life into her own hands.

movies.title: SPA24 Un Chien Andalou + L'Age d'Or
movies.synopsis:
UN CHIEN ANDALOU  

Released in 1929, UN CHIEN ANDALOU remains a ground-breaking short work directed by Luis Buñuel and co-written with Salvador Dalí. Buñuel’s first film offers a surrealistic exploration of the subconscious inviting viewers to interpret its dreamlike narrative and delve into the depths of the human psyche.  

Lacking a traditional structure Buñuel and Dalí craft a dreamlike and often nonsensical narrative through disjointed scenes and often bizarre and shocking imagery. The work challenges viewers to interpret meaning whilst offering a glimpse into the highly influential avant-garde art movement of the early 20th Century and is a seminal piece of surrealist cinema. 

L'AGE D'OR 

Uniting the genius of Luis Buñuel and Salvador Dalí, L’AGE D'OR offers a uniquely savage blend of visual poetry and social commentary in a masterpiece of cinematic surrealism that remains as brilliantly witty and shocking as ever. A sinister yet poignant chronicle of a couple’s struggle to consummate their desire – the film was banned and vilified for many years for its subversive eroticism and furious dissection of ‘civilised’ values. 

Directed Luis Buñuel and co-written with Salvador Dalí, it challenges conventional storytelling and explores the depths of the subconscious. Celebrated for innovative cinematography, surreal imagery, and profound exploration of human desires and repression, it serves as a testament to the artistic vision of Buñuel and Dalí, who sought to create thought-provoking cinema that transcends traditional narrative structures.
movies.shortSynopsis: A 1929 avant-garde short film by Luis Buñuel and Salvador Dalí, Un Chien Andalou is a surrealistic exploration of the subconscious inviting viewers to interpret its dreamlike narrative and delve into the depths of the human psyche. L’Age d’Or is a surrealist tale of a man and a woman who are passionately in love, but their attempts to consummate it are thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.

movies.title: SPA24 Artificial Justice
movies.synopsis:
A taut political thriller, Artificial Justice stars four-time Goya nominee Verónica Echegui, alongside Goya winners, Alberto Ammann (NARCOS, CELL 211) and Tamar Novas (THE SEA INSIDE). 

In the near future, the Spanish Government aims to replace judges with Artificial Intelligence software, pledging to effectively automate and depoliticise the justice system. As part of the process, Carmen Costa (Echegui), a distinguished Judge, has been invited to assess this new procedure.  

However, when the software’s creator suddenly disappears, Carmen realises her life is in danger and that she will have to fight the powerful interests at play within business and government, against the backdrop of intense media debate about the new technology. 

A highly topical film that blends noir and thriller elements with political conspiracies, while exposing the shady dealings of multinational lobbies, ARTIFICAL JUSTICE is a warning bell on the ethics of technology and steps up the debate on the boundaries of Artificial Intelligence.
movies.shortSynopsis: A taut political thriller set in the near future starring Verónica Echegui as a judge who must assess new Artificial Intelligence software for use in the justice system and is drawn into a high stakes conspiracy with powerful interests at play.

movies.title: SPA24 Yesterday Never Ends
movies.synopsis:
In this absorbing drama, Isabel Coixet examines the complexities of relationships and the human experience amidst an economic crisis in the shadow of personal tragedy. The story revolves around couple Ana (Candela Peña), a journalist, and Santi (Javier Cámara), a politician, as they navigate the challenges of unemployment, financial instability, and the harsh realities of the world around them. 

Isabel Coixet's direction brings a raw and intimate perspective to the film, capturing the emotional depth and vulnerability of the characters. Candela Peña delivers a powerful performance as Ana, portraying her inner turmoil and search for meaning amidst uncertainty, while Javier Cámara's portrayal of Santi adds layers of complexity, as he grapples with his own guilt and insecurities. 

A poignant reflection on the human condition, resilience, and the enduring power of hope in the face of adversity, through its evocative storytelling and authentic performances, it invites viewers to contemplate the fragility of life and the importance of connection in times of crisis.
movies.shortSynopsis: An absorbing character study from Isabel Coixet following a couple who reunites after five years apart. Now one has decided to turn the past into a novel. The couple reconvene, unearthing grief and anger, hatred and bitterness.

movies.title: SPA24 Upon Open Sky
movies.synopsis:
A searing, morally thorny tale set in early 1990s Mexico, featuring a screenplay by legendary Mexican scriptwriter Guillermo Arriaga (BABEL, 21 GRAMS, THE THREE BURIALS OF MELQUIADES ESTRADA), UPON OPEN SKY is the directorial debut film of his children Mariana and Santiago Arriaga. 

In this electrifying tale of revenge, two teenage brothers Fernando and Salvador decide to take a road trip to the border between Mexico and the US to track down the man responsible for the car accident that caused their father’s death.  

Joined by Paula, the stepsister they have only just met, the three siblings embark on a tense journey into adulthood which, ultimately, will have them come to terms with the loss of their father. 

With a score from Ludovico Einaudi and set across a rugged arid landscape, UPON OPEN SKY is a powerful thriller imbued with youthful rage that questions forgiveness and love within the family, as each of the siblings learn about themselves and the world.
movies.shortSynopsis: Three siblings embark on a tense journey of revenge in this searing, morally thorny tale set in early 1990s Mexico, featuring a screenplay by legendary Mexican scriptwriter Guillermo Arriaga.

movies.title: SPA24 Un Amor
movies.synopsis:
Directed and co-written by prolific Spanish director Isabel Coixet (THE BOOKSHOP, THE SECRET LIFE OF WORDS), searing drama Un Amor tells a story of passion and power in rural Spain. 

Escaping stressful city-life and aiming to start afresh, thirty-year old Natalia (Laia Costa, also in THE TEACHER WHO PROMISED THE SEA) finds refuge in La Escapa, a small village deep in the Spanish countryside.  

In a dilapidated house with a dog by her side, Nat faces hostility from her landlord and distrust from the local villagers. movies.shortSynopsis: A striking drama from prolific director Isabel Coixet, starring Laia Costa and Hovik Keuchkerian as two new neighbours in a small village deep in rural Spain who become entangled in a web of passion.

movies.title: SPA24 Just One Small Favour
movies.synopsis:
The Gallardos are a rich, well-respected family, who spend their summers in a beautiful country house, which is taken meticulous care of by Amparito. Dearly loved by the family’s three children, Amparito, known to them as Nanny, has been like a second mother. 

When the now-adult children receive the sad news of her death, the three siblings travel to the village to say their last goodbyes and see Tomás, Amparito’s son. What they did not expect was Amparito’s dying wish!  

After refusing to do this favour, they receive letters from Amparito, in which she reveals the skeletons hidden in the closet that will turn their lives upside down.  

Directed by Juana Macías (UNDER THE SAME ROOF SPA21), JUST ONE SMALL FAVOUR is an all-star ensemble comedy set over a single cathartic weekend, featuring a good dose of acerbic wit and revenge.
movies.shortSynopsis: Set at a beautiful summer house, this ensemble family comedy sees the adult children of a wealthy family facing the skeletons in their closets when their late nanny leaves a series of letters for them.

movies.title: SPA24 The Blue Star
movies.synopsis:
A moving drama inspired by the life of Spanish musician and poet Mauricio Aznar, leader of the bands GOLDEN ZIPPERS, MÁS BIRRAS and ALMAGATO. While on a self-discovery trip through the Argentinean interior, he finds a new passion for life and folk music. 

In the rocking 1990s, Mauricio (Pepe Lorente) travels to Latin America in a desperate attempt to rekindle the flame of his passion for music. On his journey he meets the welcoming Don Carlos, a veteran musician going through hard times despite being the author of some of the most famous songs in his country's folklore, who barely manages to pay his bills. Their unexpected encounter leads to an odd musical alliance that, although it has all the makings of failure, will mark the beginning of an unforgettable Quixote-like adventure. 

The feature directorial debut of Javier Macipe, THE BLUE STAR is a beautifully universal film about the search for one's vocation and a delectable musical journey.
movies.shortSynopsis: A moving drama inspired by the life of 1990s Spanish rock star Mauricio Aznar and his journey through picturesque Argentina to reconnect with his passion for music.

movies.title: SPA24 Checkmates
movies.synopsis:
A box office hit in Spain; CHECKMATES is a feel-good family film based on an incredible true story of a group of students overcoming great odds.  

Teacher Candela (Alexandra Jiménez, also in IDOL AFFAIR and THE TENDERNESS) mistakenly believed climbing the social ladder only went one way: up. Now, after a traumatic and unexpected divorce, Candela’s life slides into mediocrity. She loses her job at an elite private school and finds herself forced to turn to her family for help.  

Hoping for a second chance, she gets offered the opportunity to return to her old high school in a humble neighbourhood of Zaragoza and teach a group of socially marginalised students. With the game of chess, Candela brings her students together as a team that has a chance to compete in a national tournament. 

Directed and co-written by Nacho G. Velilla (NO MANCHES FRIDA) this heartfelt tale about fairness and overcoming differences is loosely inspired by a real-life Zaragoza teacher.
movies.shortSynopsis: A feel-good Spanish box office hit based on a powerful and inspiring true story; Checkmates follows a group of marginalised schoolkids who set out to win the Spanish Chess Championship against all odds.

movies.title: SPA24 Jokes & Cigarettes
movies.synopsis:
Directed and written by award-winner David Trueba (LIVING IS EASY WITH EYES CLOSED SPA14) and starring David Verdaguer (SUMMER 1993 SPA18) in a transformative performance, Jokes & Cigarettes follows the early days of the famous Catalan humourist Eugenio, a chain-smoking comedian known for his deadpan delivery, smoked glasses and trademark total black attire.  

Barcelona, the mid 1960s. Young jeweler Eugenio meets Conchita on a bus, and it is love at first sight. He learns to play guitar to accompany her in her musical career, and despite stage fright, they start to play together as ‘Els dos’. When Conchita leaves Barcelona for two weeks, she convinces Eugenio to perform solo and he becomes a phenomenon in the city’s underground stand-up comedy scene. With her help, he creates his alter ego—the dark glasses, the black shirt, the barstool, the cigarettes and the highball glass—the character that would soon become an unexpected success in a depressed nation desperate to laugh.
movies.shortSynopsis: Directed by multiple Goya Award winner David Trueba, this drama stars a transformative David Verdaguer as Eugenio, the famous chain-smoking Catalan comedian of the 1960s and 70s, known for his deadpan delivery, tinted glasses and trademark black attire.

movies.title: SPA24 The Girls at the Station
movies.synopsis:
The sixth feature from talented director Juana Macías (also directs JUST ONE SMALL FAVOUR), written by Isa Sanchez (THE MINISTRY OF TIME), THE GIRLS AT THE STATION is a powerful drama inspired by real events. 

Jara, Alex and Miranda are three girls coming of age who grew up in a juvenile detention centre, with no knowledge of unconditional love. Jara’s birthday is coming up and the three of them want to celebrate by going to the concert of their favourite performer, but they can’t afford the tickets.   

So, they meet up with an older girl and former resident of the centre who offers them an indecent proposal. But before they know it, they find themselves sliding deeper into the underbelly of Mallorca.  

Starring Julieta Tobío, Salua Hadra and María Steelman in their first acting roles, this raw story set in the universe of youth culture highlights the resilience of the central characters, their daily fight against difficult circumstances and ultimately, to find a sense of empowerment.
movies.shortSynopsis: The sixth feature from talented director Juana Macías, The Girls at the Station is a powerful drama inspired by real events starring three outstanding newcomers as friends coming of age and facing incredible events.

movies.title: SPA24 Rioja: The Land of a Thousand Wines
movies.englishTitle: Rioja: The Land of a Thousand Wines
movies.originalTitle: Rioja, la tierra de los mil vinos
movies.synopsis:
Directed by multi-Goya Award winner and Emmy nominated documentary filmmaker José Luis Lopez-Linares, RIOJA: THE LAND OF A THOUSAND WINES  is a magnificent deep dive into the world of wine and winemaking in the region. 

Featuring over thirty interviews with representatives of both big brands and artisan wineries, historians, journalists, cultural representatives and award-winning oenologists, and never before seen access to the entire wine making process, the contribution of new generations to the historic wineries of Rioja is evident.  

Bridging its rich tradition and promising future, this documentary showcases the relationship between territory and product, connecting its origins and powerful appeal on the international scene.  

Exploring the vibrant evolution of the Spanish wine industry through the human stories behind the vines, with captivating photography and careful editing, Lopez-Linares invites us to immerse ourselves in the world of Rioja wines and will leave you eager to indulge in a glass yourself.
movies.shortSynopsis: Exploring the vibrant evolution of the Spanish wine industry through the human stories behind the vines, this documentary invites you to immerse yourself in the world of wine in Rioja.

movies.title: SPA24 The Girls are Alright
movies.synopsis:
In Itsaso Arana’s directorial debut, this captivating summer tale follows a group of women in a country house, uncovering their fears and achievements, comraderies, conflicts and loves. 

A writer gathers four actresses at a converted old mill, now a country house, for a week in summer to rehearse her play; two are established actresses and two are newcomers. Over the first few days, the group settles in - to the environment, the town, the house, the play, and to themselves. As part of rehearsals and the creative process, the girls begin to share their yearnings and their own personal stories. Gradually, a spell takes hold, and the girls create a curious ecosystem that allows them to be immersed in and transformed by the play.  

Featuring a cast of up-and-coming actresses, THE GIRLS ARE ALRIGHT is an enchanting, joyous tale about hope, love, loss, legacy and the creative process.
movies.shortSynopsis: Featuring a cast of up-and-coming actresses, this enchanting, summery drama follows a group of actresses and a writer who come together in a country house for a week to rehearse a play.

movies.title: SPA24 The Other Son
movies.synopsis:
A moving portrait of adolescence, exploring grief and hope through the experience of a teenager, THE OTHER SON powerfully shows how life can be lived more intensely after a life-altering accident. 

Simon and his brother Federico (a magnetic Miguel González) live their teenage years to the fullest, until one day Simon is involved in a tragic accident at a party.  

While his family environment falls to pieces, Federico tries to live a normal life during the final weeks of his final year of high school. He starts to grow closer to Laura, his brother's ex-girlfriend, in whom he seems to find relief and comfort. Together, not only will their lives turn far from everything they imagined, but they will finally be able to begin the process of healing and self-discovery. 

An emotionally charged semi-autobiographical coming-of-age tale, THE OTHER SON is the feature film debut of promising Colombian talent Juan Sebastián Quebrada.

movies.title: SPA24 Chinas
movies.synopsis:
A coming-of-age drama about the fragile time of adolescence, CHINAS tells the story of three young girls growing up in Madrid and their search for identity and belonging. 

Nine-year-old Yun calls herself Lucía and oscillates between a strict, traditional homelife and her assimilated Spanish life at school, while her teenage sister Claudia rebels in search of her place in the world. Lucia feels Spanish and she wants to fit in, but her parents don't speak Spanish and they work all day long in their shop. 

Conflicts and contradictions arise when another girl, Xiang, arrives at Lucía’s school. Both second-generation Chinese girls cross paths, separate and become vital to each other in the search for their identity amidst the dichotomy of cultures. 

Filmed on location in Madrid, this superb third feature from award-winning writer-director Arantxa Echevarria (CARMEN & LOLA) is a fascinating tale that explores childhood, integration and belonging.

movies.title: SPA24 One Hell of a Holiday
movies.synopsis:
A charming comedy that pays homage to all grandparents, One Hell of a Holiday features an all-star ensemble cast including Tito Valverde, Gracia Olayo, Toni Acosta (POLYAMORY FOR DUMMIES SPA22) and Ernesto Sevilla (I CAN QUIT WHENEVER I WANT). 

Manuela and José are grandparents who love their children and their grandchildren. They love looking after their grandkids, but unfortunately, their adult children have become far too used to leaving their little treasures with them every five minutes.  

Indeed, Manuela and José cannot remember when they last had some free time to themselves. To top it all off, they have had to cancel their summer holiday, because their children have an important business trip and need them to look after the grandkids, once again. But before long, they discover the truth about their children’s trip and they’re not happy!  

Directed by Víctor García León (THE EUROPEANS SPA21), this fresh comedy highlights the excessive load borne by grandparents in a fun adventure for the whole family.
movies.shortSynopsis: Featuring an all-star ensemble cast including Tito Valverde, Gracia Olayo and Toni Acosta, in this charming comedy that pays homage to all grandparents, fun adventures await when two are left looking after their grandchildren yet again.

movies.title: SPA24 Vera and the Pleasure of Others
movies.englishTitle: Vera and the Pleasure of Others
movies.originalTitle: Vera y el placer de los otros
movies.heroImage: Vera and the Pleasure of Others_1680.jpg
movies.synopsis:
17-year-old Vera (a magnetic Luciana Grasso) is bored with her life. She divides her days between volleyball and school, plus a secret hobby: she rents out an empty apartment to teenagers looking for a place to have sex.  

From her distracted mother (Inés Estevez), who manages several properties, Vera steals the keys to an apartment and organises everything for the young couples. Yet, what starts out as a way to make money, develops into Vera's discovery of her own sexual desires. The teenagers come and go, using the apartment for a few uninterrupted hours. Playing invisible, Vera stays behind the closed door, as she listens to other people’s pleasure.  

A comedic and erotic tale of growing up in Argentina from debut director duo Romina Tamburello and Federico Actis, VERA AND THE STORY OF OTHERS is a story of desire and female sexuality that features a visceral soundtrack.
movies.shortSynopsis: A comedic and erotic tale about growing up, that follows 17-year-old Vera, who divides her days between volleyball, school, and a secret hobby: listening to other people’s pleasure.

movies.title: SPA24 Free Falling
movies.synopsis:
Spanish star Belén Rueda (THE SEA INSIDE) delivers a compelling performance as a gymnastics coach in this intense and complex drama.  

Marisol (Rueda) is the national rhythmic gymnastics’ coach. She is methodical, controlling, demanding, authoritarian, and does not contemplate failure as an option. The World Championship is approaching, and she is pinning all her hopes on Angelica, the most promising newcomer on the team. 

Two weeks before the final, Marisol discovers that her husband is having an affair with a much younger woman. Unable to contemplate failure, Marisol launches into a desperate race to win him back, with no regard for his motives or feelings. Her pain transfers to the mat, where she becomes even more relentless with Angelica, in whom she places her hopes for success. At this point, winning the gold seems to be all she has left.  

Directed by Laura Jou (LIFE WITHOUT SARA AMAT), FREE FALLING is a tale about the limits of power and sacrifice.
movies.shortSynopsis: A suspenseful, emotionally tense, and complex drama starring Belén Rueda as a controlling and demanding national rhythmic gymnastics’ coach who does not contemplate failure as an option.

movies.title: SPA24 Upon Open Sky
movies.synopsis:
A searing, morally thorny tale set in early 1990s Mexico, featuring a screenplay by legendary Mexican scriptwriter Guillermo Arriaga (BABEL, 21 GRAMS, THE THREE BURIALS OF MELQUIADES ESTRADA), UPON OPEN SKY is the directorial debut film of his children Mariana and Santiago Arriaga. 

In this electrifying tale of revenge, two teenage brothers Fernando and Salvador decide to take a road trip to the border between Mexico and the US to track down the man responsible for the car accident that caused their father’s death.  

Joined by Paula, the stepsister they have only just met, the three siblings embark on a tense journey into adulthood which, ultimately, will have them come to terms with the loss of their father. 

With a score from Ludovico Einaudi and set across a rugged arid landscape, UPON OPEN SKY is a powerful thriller imbued with youthful rage that questions forgiveness and love within the family, as each of the siblings learn about themselves and the world.
movies.shortSynopsis: Three siblings embark on a tense journey of revenge in this searing, morally thorny tale set in early 1990s Mexico, featuring a screenplay by legendary Mexican scriptwriter Guillermo Arriaga.

movies.title: SPA24 The Tenderness
movies.synopsis:
In this Shakespearian battle-of-the-sexes, writer/director Vicente Villanueva (TOC TOC) adapts the witty and highly regarded Spanish play by Alfredo Sanzol into a romantic comedy starring Emma Suárez (JULIETA) and Gonzalo de Castro. 

Queen Esmeralda and her two daughters travel towards England on the Invincible Spanish Armada, faced with arranged marriages to English noblemen, as dictated by Philip II.  

The Queen hates men because they have always ruled her life, but she is determined that her daughters will not follow the same fate. As they travel across the seas, she finds a seemingly deserted island and whips up a storm that sinks their ship. The problem is that this island is where a lumberjack and his two sons have been living for twenty years hoping to never see a woman again. 

As soon as the Queen and princesses discover that they are not alone, fearing for their lives, they dress up as men to protect themselves, and all kinds of adventures, mix-ups and love affairs begin.
movies.shortSynopsis: Starring Emma Suárez and Gonzalo de Castro, this period romantic comedy and war-of-the-sexes satire centres on a feminist queen who travels with her two daughters across the seas in search of a place free of men.

movies.title: SPA24 The Sleeping Woman
movies.synopsis:
Ana (an excellent Almudena Amor, THE GOOD BOSS) decided to study nursing to help people. Now a nursing assistant, she works as a caregiver for a woman who is in a coma state. Everything goes smoothly, she arrives, does her job and leaves. That is until she begins to feel attracted to Agustín (Javier Rey, BEYOND THE SUMMIT, THE HOUSE OF SNAILS), the woman's husband, and everything changes.  

Soon, Ana begins to be harassed by strange, paranormal phenomena, that seem to be trying to push her from the house and separate her from Agustín. 

Featuring supernatural undercurrents, this tale of romance, suspense and intrigue is the feature film debut from up-and-coming director Laura Alvea (THE SNOW GIRLS). Shot in Seville and the Canary Islands, The Sleeping Woman is an intense psychological thriller that will have you on the edge of your seat.
movies.shortSynopsis: Starring Almudena Amor and Javier Rey, this psychological thriller with a supernatural undercurrent follows a nursing assistant to whom strange things start happening when she becomes attracted to her patient’s husband.

movies.title: SPA24 The Holy Mountain
movies.synopsis:
Recently marking its 50th Anniversary, Alejandro Jodorowsky’s surreal and visually stunning avant-garde odyssey has been fully restored in a lavish 4K restoration which takes viewers on a mesmerising journey through a series of bizarre and symbolic vignettes, exploring themes of spirituality, enlightenment, and the quest for transcendence. 

The film follows a character known only as "The Thief," played by Horacio Salinas, who encounters an enigmatic alchemist, portrayed by Jodorowsky himself. The alchemist leads The Thief on a spiritual pilgrimage to the Holy Mountain, where a group of powerful and eccentric individuals seeks immortality and enlightenment. 

With production partly funded by John Lennon and Yoko Ono, the film's rich, surreal, visual style is complemented by a haunting and evocative score, composed by Jodorowsky himself. 

A deeply symbolic and allegorical exploration of the human condition and the quest for transcendence and enlightenment, THE HOLY MOUNTAIN challenges audiences to question their perceptions of reality.

movies.title: SPA24 The Teacher Who Promised the Sea
movies.englishTitle: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea
movies.originalTitle: El Maestro que Prometió el Mar
movies.heroImage: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea_1680.jpg
movies.synopsis:
In 1935, Antoni Benaiges (a stellar Enric Auquer, TWO MANY CHEFS SPA23) is hired as a teacher in a small, isolated village in Burgos, Spain. There, he establishes an intense relationship with his students, a group of young boys and girls between the ages of six and twelve. To them, he makes a promise: he will take them to see the sea for the first time in their lives. 

75 years later, the granddaughter of one of those students (played by Laia Costa, also in Un Amor) who has set out in search of her grandfather comes across the wonderful, yet tragic story of his teacher and the tale hidden behind a promise that was never fulfilled.  

Based on the incredible true story of Antoni Benaiges, a Catalan teacher who brought progressive teaching methods from France to the rural village, this emotional drama traversing the past and present, shines a light on the power of education and historical memory.
movies.shortSynopsis: Starring Enric Auquer and Laia Costa, this acclaimed drama tells the true story of Antoni Benaiges, a teacher who brought progressive teaching methods to a small village in 1930s Burgos.

movies.title: SPA24 Idol Affair
movies.synopsis:
How would you react if your partner confessed to a romantic entanglement with your idol?  

César (Hugo Silva, The Ministry of Time) and Teresa (Alexandra Jiménez, also in CHECKMATES) are a happy couple until she has an affair with pop singer Coque Malla (played by the real-life star), César’s idol ever since he was a teenager.  

Faced with this unexpected scenario, César decides he needs to speak to Coque, so the couple travels to Miami in search of the legend. Along the way, they reconsider their own lives and their relationship of over 17 years, as they navigate a range of situations from the everyday to the absurd that promise laughter and serendipitous twists of fate. 

Taking inspiration from timeless rom-coms like ANNIE HALL and WHEN HARRY MET SALLY, this captivating feature length debut from directing duo Teresa Bellón and César F. Calvillo is a fun and delightful exploration of love.
movies.shortSynopsis: A charming exploration of love, this romantic comedy starring Alexandra Jiménez and Hugo Silva follows a couple who must deal with an unexpected scenario involving the other’s idol.

movies.title: SPA24 Bad Actor
movies.synopsis:
Up-and-coming Mexican actors Sandra Navarro (Fiona Palmo) and Daniel Zavala (Alfonso Dosal) are co-starring in a new film by a prestigious filmmaker. Their chemistry is infectious and with friendly conversations occurring they appear to be on the same page for an upcoming intimate scene – even joking about filming it “for real”. But as the scene unfolds, the director notices a subtle change in Sandra’s expression. It’s only when the crew leaves the set that Sandra confesses her discontentment, accusing Daniel of misconduct and triggering an inevitable and unavoidable confrontation.  

Daniel is furious, proclaiming his innocence, while the film’s producers scramble to contain the fallout and prevent the incident from turning into a scandal. 

Featuring propulsive thriller pacing, writer/director Jorge Cuchí’s provocative and highly topical film is both an incisive exploration of consent and truth in the post #MeToo era, and a shocking exploration of how justice is delivered in the face of social media.
movies.shortSynopsis: Set in the post #MeToo era and the search for truth and justice, this nuanced, incisive and thrilling drama sees a case of misconduct on a film set trigger a series of events that no one can avoid.

movies.title: SPA24 The Practice
movies.synopsis:
When Gustavo (a marvellously deapan Esteban Bigliardi), an Argentinian living in Chile, and his Chilean wife Vanessa (Manuela Oyarzun) separate, they need to agree on how to manage their shared lives as both are yoga instructors. So, when Vanessa takes the apartment and leaves the studio they shared, Gustavo is left with a yoga studio but nowhere to live. 

Soon Gustavo must deal with increasingly absurd situations and relationships in order to land back on his feet. Due to the accumulated stress, Gustavo injures his knee and is prevented from continuing with his yoga practice. So he sets out to a retreat in search of inner peace and gradually aims to get his life back on track.  

From writer/director Martín Rejtman, this enjoyable, witty satire, set in the world of wellness and featuring a range of neurotic characters, is an incisive absurdist comedy about the search for enlightenment and happiness.
movies.shortSynopsis: Set in the world of wellness, this witty satire about two recently separated yoga instructors in Chile is an incisive comedy about the search for enlightenment and happiness.

movies.synopsis:
Directed and written by award-winner David Trueba (LIVING IS EASY WITH EYES CLOSED SPA14) and starring David Verdaguer (SUMMER 1993 SPA18) in a transformative performance, Jokes & Cigarettes follows the early days of the famous Catalan humourist Eugenio, a chain-smoking comedian known for his deadpan delivery, smoked glasses and trademark total black attire.  

Barcelona, the mid 1960s. Young jeweler Eugenio meets Conchita on a bus, and it is love at first sight. He learns to play guitar to accompany her in her musical career, and despite stage fright, they start to play together as ‘Els dos’. When Conchita leaves Barcelona for two weeks, she convinces Eugenio to perform solo and he becomes a phenomenon in the city’s underground stand-up comedy scene. With her help, he creates his alter ego—the dark glasses, the black shirt, the barstool, the cigarettes and the highball glass—the character that would soon become an unexpected success in a depressed nation desperate to laugh.
movies.shortSynopsis: Directed by multiple Goya Award winner David Trueba, this drama stars a transformative David Verdaguer as Eugenio, the famous chain-smoking Catalan comedian of the 1960s and 70s, known for his deadpan delivery, tinted glasses and trademark black attire.

movies.title: SPA24 The Blue Star
movies.synopsis:
A moving drama inspired by the life of Spanish musician and poet Mauricio Aznar, leader of the bands GOLDEN ZIPPERS, MÁS BIRRAS and ALMAGATO. While on a self-discovery trip through the Argentinean interior, he finds a new passion for life and folk music. 

In the rocking 1990s, Mauricio (Pepe Lorente) travels to Latin America in a desperate attempt to rekindle the flame of his passion for music. On his journey he meets the welcoming Don Carlos, a veteran musician going through hard times despite being the author of some of the most famous songs in his country's folklore, who barely manages to pay his bills. Their unexpected encounter leads to an odd musical alliance that, although it has all the makings of failure, will mark the beginning of an unforgettable Quixote-like adventure. 

The feature directorial debut of Javier Macipe, THE BLUE STAR is a beautifully universal film about the search for one's vocation and a delectable musical journey.
movies.shortSynopsis: A moving drama inspired by the life of 1990s Spanish rock star Mauricio Aznar and his journey through picturesque Argentina to reconnect with his passion for music.

movies.title: SPA24 Just One Small Favour
movies.synopsis:
The Gallardos are a rich, well-respected family, who spend their summers in a beautiful country house, which is taken meticulous care of by Amparito. Dearly loved by the family’s three children, Amparito, known to them as Nanny, has been like a second mother. 

When the now-adult children receive the sad news of her death, the three siblings travel to the village to say their last goodbyes and see Tomás, Amparito’s son. What they did not expect was Amparito’s dying wish!  

After refusing to do this favour, they receive letters from Amparito, in which she reveals the skeletons hidden in the closet that will turn their lives upside down.  

Directed by Juana Macías (UNDER THE SAME ROOF SPA21), JUST ONE SMALL FAVOUR is an all-star ensemble comedy set over a single cathartic weekend, featuring a good dose of acerbic wit and revenge.
movies.shortSynopsis: Set at a beautiful summer house, this ensemble family comedy sees the adult children of a wealthy family facing the skeletons in their closets when their late nanny leaves a series of letters for them.

movies.title: SPA24 Totem
movies.synopsis:
Set over a single day, TOTEM is a tender, choral drama that explores life, love, loss and time. 

In a large, bustling Mexican household, seven-year-old Sol (played by magnificent young star Naíma Sentíes) is swept up in a whirlwind of preparations for the birthday party being held for her father, Tona. Seen mostly through Sol’s eyes, the preparations are led by her mother, aunts and other relatives at her grandfather’s home.  

As the day goes on, Sol begins to understand the gravity of the celebration this year and watches as her family does the same. Daylight fades and tensions rise with a strange and chaotic atmosphere taking over, shattering the bonds that hold the family together.  

Teeming with life, this minutely observed ensemble piece is the second feature from Mexican writer-director Lila Avilés (THE CHAMBERMAID SPA19). Delicately balancing grief and celebration, touching drama Totem shares a series of evocative character studies and an immersive portrait of a family in crisis.
movies.shortSynopsis: Set over the course of a single day, this tender, choral drama explores life, love, death and time in a bustling Mexican household, seen through the eyes of a seven-year-old.

movies.title: SPA24 La Casa
movies.synopsis:
Winner of six awards at the 2024 Málaga Film Festival, La Casa is a reflective exploration of duty, regret and family ties, starring David Verdaguer (also in JOKES & CIGARETTES) and Luis Callejo (OUT IN THE OPEN SPA21). 

After the death of their father, three siblings return to the family home where they grew up. They intend to sell it and follow their very different paths in life, but as memories begin to surface, a fear of getting rid of the past and an impulse to reunite grows. Memories intertwine with the present until long buried feelings begin to overflow. As a last tribute to their father, they may still have the chance to make up for lost time. 

Adapted from the graphic novel by Paco Roca, director and co-writer Álex Montoya delivers a bittersweet journey imbued with nostalgia and a naturalistic light, that captures the universal comforting yet strange sensation of returning home.
movies.shortSynopsis: Three siblings reunite at their childhood home where long-buried memories rise to the surface in this reflective award-winning drama steeped in nostalgia, starring David Verdaguer and Luis Callejo and adapted from Paco Roca’s graphic novel.

movies.title: SPA24 Vera and the Pleasure of Others
movies.englishTitle: Vera and the Pleasure of Others
movies.originalTitle: Vera y el placer de los otros
movies.heroImage: Vera and the Pleasure of Others_1680.jpg
movies.synopsis:
17-year-old Vera (a magnetic Luciana Grasso) is bored with her life. She divides her days between volleyball and school, plus a secret hobby: she rents out an empty apartment to teenagers looking for a place to have sex.  

From her distracted mother (Inés Estevez), who manages several properties, Vera steals the keys to an apartment and organises everything for the young couples. Yet, what starts out as a way to make money, develops into Vera's discovery of her own sexual desires. The teenagers come and go, using the apartment for a few uninterrupted hours. Playing invisible, Vera stays behind the closed door, as she listens to other people’s pleasure.  

A comedic and erotic tale of growing up in Argentina from debut director duo Romina Tamburello and Federico Actis, VERA AND THE STORY OF OTHERS is a story of desire and female sexuality that features a visceral soundtrack.
movies.shortSynopsis: A comedic and erotic tale about growing up, that follows 17-year-old Vera, who divides her days between volleyball, school, and a secret hobby: listening to other people’s pleasure.

movies.title: SPA24 Mamacruz
movies.synopsis:
In comedic, transformative drama Mamacruz, Kiti Mánver (WOMEN ON THE VERGE OF A NERVOUS BREAKDOWN) delivers a standout performance as a religious grandmother who faces a moral dilemma when using the internet.  

Seamstress Cruz (Mánver) has spent years, actually decades, without achieving sexual fulfillment. Religiously devout, it was not something that she considered particularly important, or that she gave much thought to. 

One day, while surfing the internet on her granddaughter’s tablet, she accidentally stumbles across some arousing images, and starts to feel those desires and sensations she had believed were long gone. Now she is faced with a dilemma: how can she balance her religious beliefs with this new awakening? So, Cruz widens her interests, rediscovering the transformative power of her own sensuality and finding enjoyment in forgotten pleasures. 

A dynamic character study that combines humour and eroticism, MAMACRUZ is the second feature from Patricia Ortega that pays tribute to women who decide to choose their own destiny.
movies.shortSynopsis: Kiti Mánver delivers a compelling central performance in comedic yet sensual drama Mamacruz as a religiously devout woman in late middle age who suddenly rediscovers the transformative power of her own sensuality.

movies.title: SPA24 Memories of a Burning Body
movies.originalTitle: Memorias de un cuerpo que arde
movies.synopsis:
Raised in a repressive era where sexuality was taboo, sixty-somethings Ana, Patricia, and Mayela found their understanding of womanhood based on unspoken rules and implicit impositions. Now, their fearless voices are channelled into a single 65-year-old woman (Sol Carballo) in the present day. A collective outcry against taboos, their stories poetically combine to form a kaleidoscope of memories, secrets and hidden desires. 

Weaving together the past and the present, this drama is centered on the experience of women and how they understand their sexuality at the different stages of their lives. From sexuality to love, and delving into education, repression, pleasure, motherhood and liberation, it tells the story of a quest to understand themselves as women in a world that limited them.  

Described as the “conversation she never had with her grandmothers”, writer/director Antonella Sudasassi Furniss’ second feature film, MEMORIES OF A BURNING BODY, is a heartfelt exploration of female sexuality and an ode to women everywhere.
movies.shortSynopsis: In this heartfelt drama exploring pleasure and desire through the memory and intimacy of three women over 65, raised in a repressive era, their voices are channelled into a single woman who revisits intertwined memories, secrets and desires.

movies.title: SPA24 The Movie Teller
movies.synopsis:
A moving tribute to cinema and the magical power of storytelling, the star-studded new film from multi award-winning director Lone Scherfig (AN EDUCATION, ONE DAY) follows a young woman’s coming-of-age in the rugged heart of Chile’s Atacama Desert in 1966.  

Medardo (Antonio de La Torre, MARSHLAND) and María (Academy Award-nominee Bérénice Bejo, THE ARTIST) lead a simple life with their children, finding joy in the weekly visits to the cinema. However when their routine is disrupted and Medardo can’t go, he asks his daughter to describe it and what begins as a duty soon becomes a gift, as her talent for recounting the films blossoms. With each retelling, she breathes life into the magic of film, attracting and captivating the townsfolk with tales of drama, humour, and romance. As her storytelling prowess grows, so does the town's love for the cinema.  

An adaptation of the award-winning autobiographical novel by Hernán Rivera Letelier, Scherfig’s beguiling film celebrates imagination and the need to find love, community, and hope.
movies.shortSynopsis: A star-studded and moving tribute to cinema and the magical power of storytelling, this new film from multi award-winning director Lone Scherfig follows a young woman’s coming-of-age in a Chilean mining town.

movies.title: SPA24 One Hell of a Holiday
movies.synopsis:
A charming comedy that pays homage to all grandparents, One Hell of a Holiday features an all-star ensemble cast including Tito Valverde, Gracia Olayo, Toni Acosta (POLYAMORY FOR DUMMIES SPA22) and Ernesto Sevilla (I CAN QUIT WHENEVER I WANT). 

Manuela and José are grandparents who love their children and their grandchildren. They love looking after their grandkids, but unfortunately, their adult children have become far too used to leaving their little treasures with them every five minutes.  

Indeed, Manuela and José cannot remember when they last had some free time to themselves. To top it all off, they have had to cancel their summer holiday, because their children have an important business trip and need them to look after the grandkids, once again. But before long, they discover the truth about their children’s trip and they’re not happy!  

Directed by Víctor García León (THE EUROPEANS SPA21), this fresh comedy highlights the excessive load borne by grandparents in a fun adventure for the whole family.
movies.shortSynopsis: Featuring an all-star ensemble cast including Tito Valverde, Gracia Olayo and Toni Acosta, in this charming comedy that pays homage to all grandparents, fun adventures await when two are left looking after their grandchildren yet again.

movies.title: SPA24 Rioja: The Land of a Thousand Wines
movies.englishTitle: Rioja: The Land of a Thousand Wines
movies.originalTitle: Rioja, la tierra de los mil vinos
movies.synopsis:
Directed by multi-Goya Award winner and Emmy nominated documentary filmmaker José Luis Lopez-Linares, RIOJA: THE LAND OF A THOUSAND WINES  is a magnificent deep dive into the world of wine and winemaking in the region. 

Featuring over thirty interviews with representatives of both big brands and artisan wineries, historians, journalists, cultural representatives and award-winning oenologists, and never before seen access to the entire wine making process, the contribution of new generations to the historic wineries of Rioja is evident.  

Bridging its rich tradition and promising future, this documentary showcases the relationship between territory and product, connecting its origins and powerful appeal on the international scene.  

Exploring the vibrant evolution of the Spanish wine industry through the human stories behind the vines, with captivating photography and careful editing, Lopez-Linares invites us to immerse ourselves in the world of Rioja wines and will leave you eager to indulge in a glass yourself.
movies.shortSynopsis: Exploring the vibrant evolution of the Spanish wine industry through the human stories behind the vines, this documentary invites you to immerse yourself in the world of wine in Rioja.

movies.title: SPA24 The Sleeping Woman
movies.synopsis:
Ana (an excellent Almudena Amor, THE GOOD BOSS) decided to study nursing to help people. Now a nursing assistant, she works as a caregiver for a woman who is in a coma state. Everything goes smoothly, she arrives, does her job and leaves. That is until she begins to feel attracted to Agustín (Javier Rey, BEYOND THE SUMMIT, THE HOUSE OF SNAILS), the woman's husband, and everything changes.  

Soon, Ana begins to be harassed by strange, paranormal phenomena, that seem to be trying to push her from the house and separate her from Agustín. 

Featuring supernatural undercurrents, this tale of romance, suspense and intrigue is the feature film debut from up-and-coming director Laura Alvea (THE SNOW GIRLS). Shot in Seville and the Canary Islands, The Sleeping Woman is an intense psychological thriller that will have you on the edge of your seat.
movies.shortSynopsis: Starring Almudena Amor and Javier Rey, this psychological thriller with a supernatural undercurrent follows a nursing assistant to whom strange things start happening when she becomes attracted to her patient’s husband.

movies.title: SPA24 Saturn Return
movies.synopsis:
Winner of Best Spanish Film at the 2024 Málaga Film Festival, SATURN RETURN is a story of music and passion, with a hypnotic soundtrack. 

In the late 1990s, art and culture are at their height in Granada and an indie rock music group is on a quest to record their third LP, which will either propel them to stardom or see them fade into oblivion. Their idea is to have the recording take place in New York, but everything becomes complicated, and the creative process turns into an ordeal. Relationships shatter, rehearsals become self-destructive, and the unbearable pressure from the record label leads to arguments, only interrupted by fleeting moments of happiness. Yet, nobody realises that they are creating an album that will forever change the music scene for an entire generation. 

Inspired by, but not based on, the story of the legendary Spanish band LOS PLANETAS, this beautiful, disruptive drama highlights the complexity in creative work and showcases excellent performances from up-and-coming actors.
movies.shortSynopsis: Winner of Best Spanish Film at the 2024 Málaga Film Festival, this beautiful, disruptive drama is a story of music and passion, with a hypnotic soundtrack.

movies.title: SPA24 Something is About to Happen
movies.synopsis:
A thriller with surreal black comedic touches, this unique road movie and journey across Madrid starring Malena Alterio (IN THERAPY SPA23) in a Goya-winning, career-defining performance as a woman looking for freedom. 

Lucia (Alterio) lives an uneventful life as an IT specialist in Madrid. When the company she works for goes bankrupt due to embezzlement, she decides to make a radical change in her life.  

She meets a series of colourful people, including theatre producer Roberta, and flirty journalist Ricardo. Yet, Lucía secretly hopes that one day she will meet actor Braulio, to whom she owes her obsession with the Turandot aria “Nessun Dorma”, and he will become her prince charming. But fantasy doesn’t always live up to reality. 

Adapted from Juan José Millás’ bestselling novel, this dramatic thriller from Antonio Méndez Esparza delivers a refreshing take on the cultural elite, obsession and truth.
movies.shortSynopsis: In this blackly comic dramatic thriller starring Malena Alterio in her Goya-winning role, a woman's life takes a definitive turn the day that she loses her job as a computer programmer and decides to take life into her own hands.

movies.title: SPA24 The Girls are Alright
movies.synopsis:
In Itsaso Arana’s directorial debut, this captivating summer tale follows a group of women in a country house, uncovering their fears and achievements, comraderies, conflicts and loves. 

A writer gathers four actresses at a converted old mill, now a country house, for a week in summer to rehearse her play; two are established actresses and two are newcomers. Over the first few days, the group settles in - to the environment, the town, the house, the play, and to themselves. As part of rehearsals and the creative process, the girls begin to share their yearnings and their own personal stories. Gradually, a spell takes hold, and the girls create a curious ecosystem that allows them to be immersed in and transformed by the play.  

Featuring a cast of up-and-coming actresses, THE GIRLS ARE ALRIGHT is an enchanting, joyous tale about hope, love, loss, legacy and the creative process.
movies.shortSynopsis: Featuring a cast of up-and-coming actresses, this enchanting, summery drama follows a group of actresses and a writer who come together in a country house for a week to rehearse a play.

movies.title: SPA24 The Girls at the Station
movies.synopsis:
The sixth feature from talented director Juana Macías (also directs JUST ONE SMALL FAVOUR), written by Isa Sanchez (THE MINISTRY OF TIME), THE GIRLS AT THE STATION is a powerful drama inspired by real events. 

Jara, Alex and Miranda are three girls coming of age who grew up in a juvenile detention centre, with no knowledge of unconditional love. Jara’s birthday is coming up and the three of them want to celebrate by going to the concert of their favourite performer, but they can’t afford the tickets.   

So, they meet up with an older girl and former resident of the centre who offers them an indecent proposal. But before they know it, they find themselves sliding deeper into the underbelly of Mallorca.  

Starring Julieta Tobío, Salua Hadra and María Steelman in their first acting roles, this raw story set in the universe of youth culture highlights the resilience of the central characters, their daily fight against difficult circumstances and ultimately, to find a sense of empowerment.
movies.shortSynopsis: The sixth feature from talented director Juana Macías, The Girls at the Station is a powerful drama inspired by real events starring three outstanding newcomers as friends coming of age and facing incredible events.

movies.title: SPA24 The Teacher Who Promised the Sea
movies.englishTitle: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea
movies.originalTitle: El Maestro que Prometió el Mar
movies.heroImage: The Teacher Who Promised the Sea_1680.jpg
movies.synopsis:
In 1935, Antoni Benaiges (a stellar Enric Auquer, TWO MANY CHEFS SPA23) is hired as a teacher in a small, isolated village in Burgos, Spain. There, he establishes an intense relationship with his students, a group of young boys and girls between the ages of six and twelve. To them, he makes a promise: he will take them to see the sea for the first time in their lives. 

75 years later, the granddaughter of one of those students (played by Laia Costa, also in Un Amor) who has set out in search of her grandfather comes across the wonderful, yet tragic story of his teacher and the tale hidden behind a promise that was never fulfilled.  

Based on the incredible true story of Antoni Benaiges, a Catalan teacher who brought progressive teaching methods from France to the rural village, this emotional drama traversing the past and present, shines a light on the power of education and historical memory.
movies.shortSynopsis: Starring Enric Auquer and Laia Costa, this acclaimed drama tells the true story of Antoni Benaiges, a teacher who brought progressive teaching methods to a small village in 1930s Burgos.
